import Like from '../Admin/AdminHome/imgs/Like.png'; import Dislike from '../Admin/AdminHome/imgs/Dislike.png'; function CommentCard(props) { return <>


{props.comment.CandidateName}
{props.comment.Comment}
By {props.comment.Commenter}{" "} - {props.comment.DateTime}


{' '}{' '} {props.comment.Like}
{' '} {" "}{props.comment.Dislike}








} export default CommentCard;
